content.rendered:
Roadtrips Special Statement regarding the 2020 PGA Championship

The PGA of America and the City of San Francisco have decided to hold the 2020 PGA Championship from August 3-9 without spectators due to COVID-19 and a concern for public health. The 2021 PGA Championship is scheduled to take place May 17-23, 2021 on The Ocean Course at Kiawah Island Golf Resort in South Carolina.

Custom VIP 2020 PGA Championship Packages

In 2020, the PGA Championship will head to the west coast for the first time in over 20 years. The 102nd edition of the tournament will be held at the stunning TPC Harding Park in San Francisco. It’s the perfect year to experience the PGA Championship as it plays out in one of the most beautiful parts of the country. Personalize your experience with your choice of first class hotels, tickets to any round of the PGA Championship, and more.

Join us to witness the sport’s elite gather to compete for privileges, pride, and of course, the purse. Complete 2020 PGA Championship packages available from $1,155 per person (2 rounds); from $2,735 (4 rounds).
